DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: Predefined groups in OpenCms
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Predefinied groups in OpenCms and their pecularities

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: All members of the administrators group are automatically root administrators.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Users in this group are automatically workplace users.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Guest and Export user are in this group. It is in particular used for all users that do not log in.
